desc: Statistical pattern recognition relates to the use of statistical techniques for analysing data measurements in order to extract information and make justified decisions.Â  It is a very active area of study and research, which has seen many advances in recent years. Applications such as data mining, web searching, multimedia data retrieval, face recognition, and cursive handwriting recognition, all require robust and efficient pattern recognition techniques.

details.authors: Andrew R. Webb, Keith D. Copsey

title: Statistical Pattern Recognition
